page.title: 16Tourism 2
page.content:
There are 65 hotels and guest houses and 26 self-catering flats advertised in{Scarborough's}official holiday brocure. In addition, an unobtainable but significant number of private houses take bed-and-breakfast and full-board visitors during the summer season from May to September.
{ Scarborough}Council owns 215 beach bungalows in{North Bay}for daily or weekly hire in the season.
{ Burniston Road}caravan park has 85 caravans, a mobile shop, a toilet and shower block, dog compound and play area.
{ Scalby Manor}site has space for 270 touring vans and 25 tents. It has supermarket, laundry, showers, toilet blocks, dog compound and play area.
